entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/simi_v2/api_webgisclient/plotinfo-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2022.03.16 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=50m -p CPU_LIMIT=100m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=50Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=100Mi -p BASEURL=geo-i.so.ch -p TERRAVISURL=terravis.so.ch | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration plotinfo-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc plotinfo-service
